hooks.prompt:
After editing code files, follow this workflow IN ORDER:
1. FIRST: Run tests (.venv/bin/python -m pytest) - must pass before proceeding
2. SECOND: Run linting (ruff check && ruff format --check) - must pass before proceeding
3. THIRD: Add changelog entry to CHANGELOG.md (unless this IS the changelog)

Do not skip steps or change the order. Tool call details: $ARGUMENTS

After writing code files, follow this workflow IN ORDER:
1. FIRST: Run tests (.venv/bin/python -m pytest) - must pass before proceeding
2. SECOND: Run linting (ruff check && ruff format --check) - must pass before proceeding
3. THIRD: Add changelog entry to CHANGELOG.md (unless this IS the changelog)

Do not skip steps or change the order. Tool call details: $ARGUMENTS
